content.detailedDescription: It was around one thirty a.M. when my sister and i were sitting on a second floor balcony of our hotel facing north. there was a mild fog/haze surrounding the whole area, since we were about a hundred yards from the shore. only stars directly above us were visible. her and i decided to try to get on the roof for a better view, and not fearing the repercussions, we got on the elevator. the structure had twelve floors, each with north and south-east facing balconies. as we got out of the elevator, we noticed a communal balcony to the right of the elevator, facing south-east, facing the ocean and part of the city. we appeared to be at the highest point within eye's view [which was about a mile or two, due to the haze.] as we got out, we began to smoke a cigarette and discuss whatever was on our minds at the time when my sister noticed three very bright red lights stationary about three hundred yards in the air, and about a mile or two away from our location to our left. we focused in and noticed that it wasn't moving in any direction. simply floating in the sky. my sister asked if it could be a star or a planet, but due to the haze, it was sure that the light wouldn't come through. it was in the sky, in front of the fog. five, ten and fifteen minutes went by with this object in the same position above the ocean. i inferred from its fix that it was gathering information about that particular region of the sea. about twenty minutes had passed when we noticed a small white ball, about the twice the size as a start appears in the sky eject from the left side of this red-lit object. it continued on a straight path slowly for about five minutes, seemingly probing the area, until it stopped, and returned to where it had come from. the moment the orb had made its entry, the craft began slowly moving south-east, and using refrence points on the ground, we tracked its movement until it disappeared into the mist. during the duration of this event, we both felt as if our presence was acknowledged by whomever was piloting the craft. emotionally, it was a mixture of fear and interest, but my sister's eyes were indicating her fear over interest.
content.summary: Ufo above the ocean. studying and probing on the new jersey shore.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch having a smoke as i look into the night sky. i watched a white light that appeared to be an airplane in the distance approaching with it's landing lights on. the distance was so great that the two headlights appeared as one. the approach was slow like watching an airplane in the distance. it was also high in the sky, about 50 degrees up from the horizon in the northeast sky moving west. the light suddenly changed direction and rapidly accelerated, vanishing into the sky in a 1 or 2 seconds.
this may be nothing. however, the night was clear and cold. many stars were out. and eyes were still pretty good being about 30 yrs. old at the time. i have enjoyed watching planes fly all my life. considering the distance and the speed at which it vanished, it leaves me believing that no human could servive the force of the acceleration.
the speed was extremely fast.
content.summary: Strange light movement in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
1) in a small low elevation area near the entrance to red rock canyon and i was taking a photo of the cactus like plant in the shot.

2) never saw it.  only noticed something got in my shot when looking at the small lcd screen on the back of the nikon d70 i was using and i thought the shot was ruined.  i got my first real look at it once i got back home a few days later.

3) i honestly didn't think it was what i thought.  some say bug, but the white poofy smoke thing still makes me think.

4) looks like a silver metallic object with smoke exhaust going from left to right.

5) n/a due to never seeing it in the 1st place.

6) same as above, never knew it was there.


feedback is always appreciated.
content.shape: Blimp,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Disc,  Oval
content.summary: Red rock canyon photo shoot

content.detailedDescription:
Walking dog with daughter. three unusually bright lights hovering without movement or sound. didn't have any idea.
3 bright lights, circle shaped, standing in a row above trees, one on top of the other.  we started up our driveway to get a better look, but within those few seconds it had vanished, completely out of sight.  no sound. we saw no trail.  people from little river, sc  (20 mi or so north of myrtle beach)into garden city (another 20 mi. south of m.B.) reported seeing this same object.  many people called into the radio stations the next morning to report the sighting.  people who saw this were asking the radio stations if they knew anything about it.  there was never a follow up. my husband and daughter were speechless when they saw it.  my husband never believed in other life outside of our universe who can visit.  he isn't so sure anymore of that.
content.summary: Three bright lights, horizontal row, no sound, no movement, disappeared suddenly without sound.  above trees in our back yard.  sighting was made all down the grand strand from 7pm to 9pm  .  people reported it on the radio next morning and questioning.

content.detailedDescription: My dad, mom, sisters and i were on our way to ca, slept overnight off route 66, in new mexico. we awoke and my dad said look up.  there were 3 discs hovering above us. very shiny metallic.  made a slight whirring noise.  i was 12 yrs old at the time.  we watched and the 3 darted first in one direction and then  another at terrific speed. they were comletely out of sight in seconds.  my dad thougth they were some new plane we had developed.  we had never heard of ufos at that time. in later years, my dad refused to talk about the sighting anymore as everyone he told said he was crazy. my momm and dad are now deceased.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were camping out on rt 66 in new mexico , awoke to see 3 discs hovering

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house office on the second floor. i was watching a movie and feeling tired decided to go to bed. after turning of the vcr/tv and closing the lights, i saw a bright white light moving above the santa monica mountain range. because i am familiar with the flight path of local air traffic, i thought this was unusual to see a light over the mountain. i picked up a pair of high powered binoculars and was able to see the craft. because there was a new moon and twilight, the silouette of the object was apparent. it was a saucer with domed top and bottom. in the middle was a continous strip of bright white light. there were no blinking red or green or white strobe lights as in a terrrestrial aircraft. the mountain range is due north at a distance of five miles. the ufo traveled slowly, i estimate 100 mph. it passed behind the first hill and could be seen between the opening of the next mountain. the craft dipped a little as though it was follwing the terrain. this ufo was large; at least the length of a commerical passenger jet. the object was silent, absolutely no noise was heard. i opened my window to confirm and it was silent. because i have read numerous books on ufo's in the past and seen documentry films, i immedialy know this was an extraterrestrial object. i was not scared. i lost sight of the ufo within two minutes as it passed behind the mountain range. it was traveling east to northwest. i do need to mention that my friend michael has a book and newspaper articles on ufo sightings and abductions in topange canyon, which is adjacent to pacific palisades. the ufo that i witnessed the night of may 29th was headed in the exact direction of topange. i did not photograph the object, i am reporting only on the basis of an eyewitness. a camera would not have seen the contrasting silouette against the twilight that i saw with binoculars.
content.summary: Slow moving flying saucer at low altitude with band of white light

content.detailedDescription: A friend (jessie- about my age) and i were going to have a sleep over and we were waiting for his mother to finish dinner so we could go in and eat.  we had been playing in the cul-de-sac out in which our houses were located for quite a while (since dusk).  we decided to take a break and laid down on the sidewalk (head to head)to check out the stars that had come out.  i was looking over the (dead end) portion of the cul-de-sac and he was looking down the street.  we spent a while (i guess about 20 min) trying to point different stars out to each other and looking for shooting stars and such when we called out my name (kind of starteled).  he asked me if i saw something that he was looking at and i started looking around by tilting my head back (but saw nothing).  he was very excited and told me to look now!  i got up and turned his direction to see (with out a doubt in my mind) a large circular disc heading straight toward (as if to land on our street eventually) us very slowly.  it was flying very low and appeared over the houses at the entrance to our cul-de-sac.  it made no noise and except for very few lights that were more of a glow (on top) it was very dark.  more gray than black but dark.  it continued to head for us and we just stared for a little while in amazement.  i remember jessie saying, "is this what i think it is"?  i was like, "uh, yeah, it's a ufo, holy crap!"  after a few moments seemed like a long time but i remember the experience happening very quickly.  we decided to tell someone older since we knew we would never be believed.  first stop was my mother's house.  (she still remember's) i ran to the front door and asked her to come outside right now!  she asked why (because she was doing something in the oven) and i told her that there is a flying saucer outside and she has to come righ now!!  she told me that she would be, "right out" but that she had to take or put something into the oven (can't remember).  i was like, no, you are going to miss it!  i shouted back to jessie who had stayed back to watch the ship and he confirmed that it was still here.  i ran back outside to the grassy center of the cul-de-sac and looked directly up to see the ship was as large as our whole cul-de-sac.  wow... i can still remember it.  anyway, my mother still wasn't coming outside and i told jessie that she was busy and we decided to tell norman (he was like an older neighbor that was nice to us).  this time we both ran to norman's house (directly next door to mine), and knocked like crazy to get him out.  he was initially reluctant and then finally ran outside to see nothing.  it was gone.  we scrambled to the center to peer over the houses (the grassy center was slightly higher than street level) and we didn't see anything at all.  of coarse, my mother comes outside to see us standing there looking around and norman tells my mother that they missed the ufo and that was about it.  i was so depressed that nobody saw the ship and jessie moved away shortly after that so i haven't been able to ask him about it several years later. i would sketch it but it was just a large dark circlular ship. i know i saw what i saw and have told my closest friends and family and thats about it.  i still look into the sky and hope to see it again. we aren't alone.
content.summary: A low flying dark circle about the size of my cul-de-sac (houses and fences).  some light from top of ship (but muted).

content.detailedDescription: When i first shot this picture i didn't think much of it until i enlarged it and then it resembled a disk like object with a v cut out of it. i was in the field in front of my house when i took the picture.
content.summary: Looked like a disk with a v cut out of back after enlarging

content.detailedDescription:
I was stationed in tikrit, iraq w/ us army.
i took this picture in dec 2003.
i was looking at the pictures today (may 29, 2003) and noticed the object in the top right corner. looked for the object in the next picture but it was gone.
content.summary: Was taking pictures... did not see it until today

content.detailedDescription: I was in my back yard looking for anything odd with my camcord.I think dogs started barking behind me or i saw the bright ufo out of the corner of my eye, it didn't make any noise or blinking. bright yellow coming out of the west and headed to the east. as it went to the east it dimed alot, but when i turn my flashlight on it, it became brighter but it didn't respond, by doing anything else. when i freeze framed it on the camcord you could see a brighter light in the middle and it look flat on the bottom, and sometimes lt looked round.3.A satelite.Object went off to the east out of sight.At first i thought it was a satelite that goes bright then dims down, it did dim after it was away from my house but like i said it went brighter when i hit it with my flashlite and it made no noise. it headed towards turlock which is next to modesto.
content.summary: Object came from the west headed to the east. it was very bright to bright to see any structure, it look yellow and was the brightes object in the sky. i did get it on my camcord. and you can see a bright light inside the glow it look yellow. 15 sec video

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday may 28th at approximately 7:30 eastern time i was visiting my close friends that i have known over 20 years.  the apartment complex is riverchase apartments in clarksville, indiana located across the ohio river just north of louisville kentucky where i reside. 
it is my regular routine to visit said friends on sundays because it is the only occasion all three of us are off work. 
we were outside in the patio area grilling hamburgers and hotdogs.  i was standing facing east/south east.   directly in front of me less than a quarter mile away behind the adjacent apartment buildings interstate 65 extends north and south.  
myself, my friend edward, and his brother randall were standing and chatting, and for no particular reason i glanced directly up and noticed a peculiar object that was unusual enough that i called my friends attention to it. 
the sky above was clear with intermittent clouds as a storm was approaching behind us from the west. 
we observed the object for 20 to 30 seconds before i suggested to my friend that he go retrieve his binoculars. 
we all agreed the object we were viewing was a black square. 
there was no frame of reference to determine the relative distance or size of the object from our vantage point. 
it *appeared* to be above interstate 65.  
the object was moving very slowly straight up.
each of us observed the object through the binoculars as well as the naked eye, and the proportions remained consistent.  
the object was completely square, and lacked any surface details or features.  there was no reflectivity or oscillation of the object.  no markings, lights, or deviations from the square configuration. 
the object continued straight up and decreased in size as it advanced. it remained in view long enough for a detailed discussion on what it most certainly wasn't and what it could possibly be. 
the object in question was not an airplane, a helicopter, a blimp, a balloon, an insect, a black plastic garbage bag, a bird or birds, or a toy. 
the objects configuration did not adhere to established aerodynamic principles as i understand them. 
there was no sound emitted by the object.  the objects surface again gave no reflectivity suggesting a non metallic surface.  
in conclusion, witnessing the object disturbed me. 
i consider myself a fairly informed, bright individual, college educated, and i witnessed something that i cannot identify or rationalize. 
i have a moderate understanding of aerodynamics, physics, astronomy, meteorology, and various aerial phenomenon, and this object defied any conventional explanation and has left me puzzled and mystified. 
the incident had a wrongness to it, as this sort of thing isn't something you are supposed to see in the sky in broad daylight over a major metropolitan area. 
roughly an hour after the incident, i called louisville international airport and spoke with the radar operator, to ask if there were any anomolous objects in southern indiana, or whether the military was conducting exercises, both of which i was informed were not the case. 
i have considered many possible rational explanations to satiate my curiosity, including the possibility of a local transformers electromagnetic field influencing perception, but three individuals witnessed the same phenomenon which precludes mass delusion to my satisfaction. 
i do wish to say that reading such reports or seeing it on tv over the years is one thing, but to actually experience such a bizzare anomoly firsthand is quite jarring, at least to me, because of the many implications.
content.summary: Solid black square object hovering over apartment complex in broad daylight

content.detailedDescription:
May 21, 2006, 10:45 am: from room 3072 of the paris hotel, i was watching airplanes approach from over the hills east of las vegas, turn and land at mccarran airport. at the point where the planes were turning i noticed a small object, that i initially thought was a balloon, coming towards the strip. in less than 5 minutes from when i spotted it, the object slowed down above the wynn golf course area. it stayed in this area for about 5 minutes. it was not stationary at this point, but moving slowly westward. it then started picking up speed and moving in a north westerly direction and was out of my site in less than 5 minutes. it was barley visible as it left my field of view from the hotel window. 

from the point that it slowed down, i had a decent view of the object as it was directly in front of me. it was fairly high up, but well under the cloud cover. the object appeared mostly white with a patch of darker, gray on it. it seem as though it was probably the size of a car or van. the shape was not perfectly round; it seemed as though it was more pyramid shaped but very rounded. it also looked to be rotating. 

i am not sure what it was, but i could tell that it was not a balloon. it was not bobbing with the wind and the size was much too large for the height that it was at. it was not a plane as it would have dropped out of the sky as it moved slowly over the vegas strip area. there were helicopters flying well north of the object and were clearly visible as helicopters.

it was not an object i could identify and i did have a fairly close and clear view of it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small white object over las vegas

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving northbound on hwy 400 near town of rama.  
2. saw very bright light, thought it was plane, paid no attention to it until it got very bright, and suddenly radiated a color change from white to a purple haze. 
3. a plane or star or planet 
4&5 bright white stationary light very low in horizon, when it changed colors, i pulled over, two other cars pulled over shortly after i did, i got out to observe. the purple haze was odd, it looked like a moon halo, when the color changed, the intesity of the light dropped considerably, there were also 4 or 5 other people that got out ahead of me to observe the object, one guy had a camera and filmed it but when we reviewed it after on his camera screen it just looked like a big white dot
7. it kinda just disappeared ??? thats when everyone went "holy sh*t!" maybe meteor??

please dont post my email or name regarding this incident. thanks.
content.summary: Hovering light like planet, bright, color change, moved around and faded off

content.detailedDescription: My mother and myself  were coming home  from little river casino where we had departed from at 2:30. at exactly halfway home at 3:12 am, three miles south from the ludington power plant i noticed  alight at treetop level where it hovered.  i slowed down to  20 mph and took a long look. my mother was asleep and  i didn't wake her. it had lights underneath and  was isoceles triangular shaped. i would guess that the sides  were 18  to 20 feet long and the backside was about 15 feet long.  after i drove several hundred yards down  the road i accelerated to 65 mph and that was the last  i saw of it. i know what it was immediately. i know when and where my next meeting is going to take in the future. this happened during a thunderstorm.
content.summary: Hovered at tree level  75 yards away

content.detailedDescription:
Laying down in a hammock outside, up on a hill, overlooking part  the treeline over the highway.
i saw it through the trees to my left and thought it was s stationary building i had never seen before, but then it moved into my direct view, and i got very scared.  then it stopped again over the highway, right in front of me and stayed put.
i ran down the hill outside my girlfriends house to my car to get my binoculars. i got them (nikon large lens= good pair), and ran back up the hill to the opposite (dark side) of the house near the hammock.  it had moved again behind the trees to the right, but was still apparent through the trees.  i got a good look at it through the binoculars.  it was not moving again, but still over the highway going north toward middletown.  distance was two miles- i knew because i drove down to the highway entrance where it was 100 times.

i followed the object in my car past kingston and into the catskills.  i was not the only car doing this.  there are other people who i do not know who shared this experience.

i was told a month later that the objects were a coordinated group of small lightweight planes (ultra-light) and a hoax.  but this was just planely not true.

years later i believed this was a stealth bomber.  and i was satisfied with this for some time, but lately i think something more sinister that happened in prattsville on route 23a.  i remember i thought there was a car that had crashed off the road down the bank by the schoharie river.  i thought it was a car on fire, but it was not.  i yelled down the cliff- it was steep with many trees.  i saw a guy and he waved to me.

i do not remember, well, what i remember does not make sense.  i cannot fill in all the blanks.  i was running through a hayfield in the pitch dark and there were three objects moving through the hayfield behind me.  i remeber being in a room.  i thought i knew the room.  i used a paper scanner and it flashed green in the room. and then i felt safe again.  it makes no sense.  but i know i captured something on the macintosh scanner, and i knew for some reason that this was a huge problem, that this was not supposed to happen.  i don't know.  i was scared, i was making jokes- its all confusing.  i'm sorry.
content.summary: I saw a large triangular object outlined in circular light over route 287 in ardsley, ny in 1988.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was outside on may 21, 2006 at 2:00p.M. from under the eaves he saw the silver shimmering craft in the east at 2,000 ft.  it changed direction and went north, becoming fainter and fainter until he lost sight of it. two older men in the building said that they had seen the craft 8 years. ago.
witness also saw this craft on may 20, 2006 at 5,000 to 7,000 ft. at which time it went into a cloud at 45 degree angle and came out at right angles to itself. he tried to wave at the object to attract its attention.  
he saw the same object on may 3 at 6:30 p.M. it took 15 minutes to go 1/4 of the sky. 
on may 6 he saw the object near the airport.  the bottom was raund & glistening.  it drifted off to the east.
on may 8 he saw it at 6:00 to 6:30 p.M. for about 10 minutes at 10,000 to 20,000 ft. and at about 30 degrees in the eastern sky as he was driving downtown.  it was shining 
silver.
on may 17th he again saw the object as he was driving over the edison bridge.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Silver shimmering craft seen 5-21-06 and five other times

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back home from work out of town. i pulled over to take some pictures of a big double rainbow. i took several shot and then got back in my truck homeward bound. later (about an hour) i was trying to catch lightening on video and i filmed some low lying thick clouds but got nothing. the next day i looked though the video and was amazed to see a red sphere in the low lying clouds not moving or flashing. you can clearly see it is not a reflection on the windshield or an abnormality in the video. everyone i���ve shown the video are amazed with no explanation for what they see.  

i looked through the photos and found white spheres traveling by the rainbow. i was using a 6.1 mega pixel camera so the closest sphere is well focused and clear. other spheres were traveling in the picture too but further in the distance but still clearly visible in the photos. i took multiple shots of the rainbow so there is a good reference to determine movement of the spheres in the sky.

all my material is well focused and clear. in the photos you can clearly see the object is a perfect sphere because of the shadow under the craft. the spheres did not look metallic. in the photos they look like distant planets or moons but 50 times smaller than our moon. the video is over 30 seconds long.
content.summary: Photos & video of spheres in the sky. 2 separate sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I forgot i was watering my plants, went out to turn off the water. before going back inside the house, i looked up in the sky to see what i could see.  then there was this faint outline of an object with 8 or 9 small lights. wasn't  sure what i was at first, thought it might be metorite fragments-no tails, concluded it was a flying object of some sort. then thought it was ufo's flying in tight formation. as i thought about it more, it was a triangle.

appeared high up, approx 8-9 lights, possible almost inaudiable high pitch hiss, if i held a ruler to the object at arms length about 3/4 inch from one end to the other, lights white, faint outline of object, moved very  quickly and smoothly across the sky. 

reaction, i looked up to see what i could see, and i saw something.  it was my first triangle. seen lots of ufos before.

lost the object as it faded into the background of stars.
content.summary: Appeared high up, approx 8-9 lights, possible almost inaudiable high pitch hiss, if i held a ruler to the object at arms length about 3/4 inch from one end to the other, lights white, faint outline of object, moved very quickly across the sky,

content.detailedDescription: I was at boothill graveyard in tombstone,az taking pictures.  stopped there before nightfall and oncoming rain to check it out with the o.K. corral.  had a friend take my picture next to les moore's gravestone and when the pic developed, there was an object in the background.  it is not in the pics before or after this one.  it does show up on the negative.  didn't even notice anything until i got the pics developed in a scottsdale mall.  my friend didn't see anything when the pic was taken.  we didn't recall seeing or hearing birds or airplanes in the area.  we weren't really paying attention though but i was enjoying the scenery and never saw a thing out of the ordinary.  hope you have a suggestion as to what this object is.  i still do have the negative if needed.  it looks like a rounded off triangle shape.  i showed the pic to some friends and they can't explain what it could be.  i remember the clouds weren't too high in the sky that day if that helps.  it was getting late and about to rain out.
content.summary: Vacation pic in tombstone, az.

content.detailedDescription: I was at boothill graveyard in tombstone,az taking pictures.  stopped there before nightfall and oncoming rain to check it out with the o.K. corral.  had a friend take my picture next to les moore's gravestone and when the pic developed, there was an object in the background.  it is not in the pics before or after this one.  it does show up on the negative.  didn't even notice anything until i got the pics developed in a scottsdale mall.  my friend didn't see anything when the pic was taken.  we didn't recall seeing or hearing birds or airplanes in the area.  we weren't really paying attention though but i was enjoying the scenery and never saw a thing out of the ordinary.  hope you have a suggestion as to what this object is.  i still do have the negative if needed.  it looks like a rounded off triangle shape.  i showed the pic to some friends and they can't explain what it could be.  i remember the clouds weren't too high in the sky that day if that helps.  it was getting late and about to rain out.
content.summary: Vacation pic in tombstone, az.

content.detailedDescription: I was working on a rock crusher at the time of this event. i was facing west with the sun behind my back. the crusher had not yet been fired up so there was no noise from the machinery and the only noise was coming from the highway and even that was just the sound of distant passing cars. i looked up as i heard the sound of a low flying jet and saw a jet liner that must have been coming out of casper. it was only a thousand feet or so up as i could make out the piping on the plane ( red - must have been a western flight) and i could even make out the individual windows. i have seen a few flights come out of casper at around that altitude. as the airliner continued to move ( it was going on a se course - i assumed toward denver) another object appeared below and to the rear of the airliner. at first i thought that it must be some sort of towed blimp. my logic for that was that it was a seamless craft and obviously made of metal ...It was glinting in the sunlight as did some of the parts of the airliner. this object made no noise ( the airliner did) this object had no identifiable doors or windows and it appeared to be about 3/4 of the length of the airliner it was following. it was only slightly thinner than the airliner. after the first minute or so of watching the event before me i discarded the idea that the object was a blimp..Or even another aircraft. it was following the airliner maybe 500 feet below.. and 500 feet behind.. it moved in perfect unison with the jet as though it was tethered by a iron bar. where as i could clearly make out the details of the airliner ( wings- piping-windows- noise) the object had none of these. it appeared to be a metal cigar shaped craft with (no windows - no doors or seams - no paint or logo - no wings or engines- and no noise).  the airliner and the object continued past my position and flew directly across two roadways..Ther first a minor two lane highway and then another mile and a half further it crossed the i-25 interstate and kept going till it was beyond the horizon and my ability to observe it further.The entire sighting lasted perhaps 4 minutes. i have since then had a few sightings of things i could not identify flying through our skies but nothing that compares in detail to this sighting.
content.summary: Watched craft following airliner  until both vanished from view over the horizon

content.detailedDescription: My father(anonymous) and his freind larry shearin, who was an air force fireman at the time, were out deer hunting on the roanoke river(in a power boat) at night that fall. they observed, for quite some time, three metallic objects, glowing orange. larry states that he could see them "change" into the saucer shape right before his eyes. they hovered for some time 25 yards away. larry and my father were hiding underneath a weeping willow tree, and actually observed them through the scopes of their 7mm magnums for, what larry said to be, forever. it's hard to tell how long because the sheer strangness of what they were witnessing could have made their time estimates horribly innaccurate. larry said they released 10 or 12 glowing red balls that descended and lit up the forest. he said he could here them whisling as they originally approached, and "winding up" with a crescendous wail before flying off and meeting high in the sky. he said the red balls stuck around longer, but eventually sped off into sky and were absorbed by one of the crafts. he then said, they disappeared into space in the blink of an eye, and were gone. larry's story also reeks of missing time. they said they couldn't believe that it was so late(early in the morning) when they made it back to camp. a game warden was waiting for them when they arrived and was "absolutely berzerk" after witnessing them himself. i have a wonderful recording of larry shearin telling the story. it is absolutely fantastic. i seriously doubt that they would ever make something like this up. i have taken this as fact every since i first heard the story when i was a little boy. this is actually the only reason i believe so deeply in the alien phenomenon. i am currently writing a novel with the sighting as the basis. if anyone can help me find out more about this type of sighting, i would be greatly relieved. can anyone shed any light on what the "red balls" may have been, and what their function might have been? i would gladly send in the recorded version of this story. i have no doubt that this is a primary document concerning a very real ufo encounter. the missing time possibility especially disturbs me, because i was my fathers first child 5 years later. i know that people report genetic manipulation, and the aliens are always portrayed to find the reproductive organs especially important. just a paranoid thought, but i think you get the picture. any info would again be greatly appreiciated. feel free to email me at grassisblue@hotmail.Com if you would like to hear the recording. parham howell ii
content.summary: 3 glowing orange objects emmitting red balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
1- i was driving home from school along i-77 south at around exit 23
2- i always seem to look at the sky in that area because the highway goes from a restricted view due to trees to a wide open area
3- thought it was possibly a plane because there is an airport near by but planes dont disappear
4- object was hovering almost directly over highway at about 3-4 thousand feet approx 1/2 mile south of my location. object approx 50 ft in diameter. silver metallic disk/saucer but thick, height of object was about 1/3 its diameter. it turned to a brite white light and disappeared withing a few seconds. observed no sound because i was listening to loud music.
5- i was not really surprised at all, more amazed. i have seen 3 other objects before
6- it disappeared/ cloaked?
feel free to contact me via e-mail, i am willing to share my other stories. i am a veteran of the us airforce and have 6 yrs experience as an aircraft technician so i know what a plane looks like.
content.summary: Silver metallic thick disc/saucer became bright white and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband, john, and i were at home in placitas, nm sitting on the porch.  we have a spectacular view of the north end of the sandia mountain range.
we were enjoying the quiet and the anticipation of the storm front moving into the city of albuquerque. john, was in the hammock facing west and i was in the porch rocker facing south. we had been out there for approx. 15 minutes discussing my phone call to our close friends back in michigan that i had just made.
i witnessed cloud lightning that produced a bolt to the ground and mentioned it to john. at our age and being together 34 years this september there comes a point of speaking the non-spoken thought.  a bolt a lightning translates between us to mean, "ah, a very strong chance that some precipitation will actually hit earth."
then, within 1 to 3 seconds of noting the lightning, i noticed a white light, like a distant star, appearing from the cloud cover where the cloud lightning originated. so, let me be clear about the bolt of lighning. i can only make an assumption that this lightning started somewhere over the northwest quadrant of the city of albuquerque. i suppose it could have been as far south as los lunas.  (i wonder what the local weather station had for cloud cover that evening at 8 or 8:10 pm?) the bolt travelled horizontally westward quite a distance before it finally arced 90 degrees and struck earth.
at first, i thought the single light to be that of an airplane, odd flight pattern, but perhaps a helicopter. then, i thought, "pretty risky business taking off in a lightning storm."  john dismissed it with, "they take off in all kinds of weather."  he seemed to be more interested in the view to the west.  i didn't give it much more attention other than i was waiting to see what kind of flight it was once it got closer to our area. when i didn't hear what i was expecting to hear i again turned my attention to the foothills to the south and up from the first ridge from us and into the sky where i first saw the light. there it still was.  it hadn't moved east nor west.  it seemed to go faint at that time.  i surmised that it was traveling southwestward.  but, something didn't make sense about that, "or, am i just hoping it is more?" (i filed a report of a craft i spotted in mid-september of 2003.)

then, it happened just like the first sighting i saw in new mexico of 2003.  the "star" magnified immensely.  i cannot give it a measure because i haven't a gauge to compare with.  as it illuminated, a second bolt of lightning was discharged traveling westward horizontally through the cloud cover and arcing 90 degrees hitting earth in seemingly the same location. with the flash of lightning the "star" disappeared.

john didn't witness a thing other than the "star"light being visible, just as in the first sighting back in 2003.  during this current observation i only saw two lightning strikes, and, both of them involved the "star".

i wondered afterward how could lightning strike twice and be identical in nature, i.E., form and location?  why would the stikes be so far away from its source - the "star"? 
 
i have not heard of any televsion, radio, nor newpaper reporting on this sighting, just like in 2003.

i am beginning to feel like a freak. this is my third sighting. the first was in kalamazoo, michigan about 15 years ago.  was mufon even existing then?
content.summary: Appeared from the cloud cover causing a bolt of lightning and left in a visual flash creating a lightning bolt again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was beginning to fall asleep when i heard the pulsating hum.  i had been visited before, so i was afraid.  i hit my husband and told him to wake up but he was totally out.  i felt a hand on my shoulder.  when i woke up the next morning, the toyota truck's clock didn't work, the oven's light had blown out, the ford falcon's battery was dead.  over the next few nights, i began to have flashbacks.  i remember standing on the gravel road leading from our house into the orchard.  there were three little greys beside me and the taller peach colored being was in front of me.  he turned around and thought to me "how do you like my suit jacket?" and i noticed the ugly green tweed jacket he wore over his bare body.  "that's the ugliest jacket i've ever seen," i said to him.  his mouth turned into a good natured smilelike, and he thought to me, "go back to sleep".
i had many encounters when i was younger, but i haven't been taken for a decade.
content.summary: Saw the blue pulsating light leading to a metallic craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 16 years old, me and my brothers and sisters were playing softball in an open field right next to our home. i was fixing to swing the bat. when i looked up and i saw it, it was very close right over our heads i froze i could not move, i could see my brothers and sisters running, then i was able to start running myself, my feet felt very heavy to move. i was very scared. up to this day this is all i can remember, i feel like a big part of my life has been taken from me. but i dream up to this very day of what they did. the ship was very big oval,lots of bright lights. me and my brothers and sisters still talk about the ufo sightings. i don't remember how we lost sight of the ufo. you may think we might be crazy but they did something to use and they gave us something. i do not have pictures, i am not an artist but i am sure we ccan all draw a picture of what we did see. 
the reason i am speking out now after all these years and i am sure my brothers and sisters will too. is because things continue to happen in our daily lifes.
content.summary: Saw it hovering over my house, i remember i could not take my eyes off it. i could not move.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying with my instructor, john gordy, making practice night landings at tulsa municipal air port.  it was dark and john was messing around with the radios which were new at that time.  an electric flash lighted the sky and the radio was cramed by airline pilots wondering what had happened.  being a student pilot, i stayed silent as real pilots were talking.  in the cessna 195 the windshield extends over the head of the pilot and co-pilot so i could look strait up at the event.  a silver streak shaped like a needle starting at the beginning of the event from the east was about a half a degree long.  it started as a point and expanded to look like a needle then blew up.  by the time i looked up the oblong shaped mass was white.  it then truned bright yellow, then went to red and the deep blood red then black.  the black cloud roiled and would open to reveal a red interior.  the elongated cloud covered about two degrees with another "needle" shape coming from the opposite end of the cloud.  it looked to me as if something that had fuel on board exploded.  the ignition point being the beginning which was carried along until the main structure exploded and the remains of the structure emerging from the cloud after the fuel was exhausted.  john gordy said he hadn't seen anything but was wearing his glasses which were like coke bottle bottoms.  the event seemed to be among the stars.  the event gradually disappeared in the night sky.  the event was reported in the tulsa newspapers and on tv.
content.summary: Flying approach to tul flash seen from kc to dal directly over head. pin point shaft exploded carrying roiling cloud 1.5 degrees across sky pin point exit from cloud.  event in shallow space.  reported in tulsa world and tribune. aircraft radio indicated

content.detailedDescription: I was checking the ucla physics and astronomy webcam regularly because of the view and noticed the cloud colored object. at first i thought it was the moon or a ball shaped cloud but when i magnified it there seem to be five or six circles on the bottom. the second attached picture was about 45 minutes later after the clouds passed to show it wasn't the moon. i searched some other sites and found a similar object glowing green in the night sky in a picture taken in may 2000 in california on the website ufoevidence.Org
content.summary: Cloud colored disc in ucla webcam

content.detailedDescription: I was about 4 and half years old. in front of home at 3423 morrell, kansas city, mo. for over 20 minutes i looked at ufo; years later i saw a photo of george adamski's ufo and it looked just like what i had seen. when i requested a ride i was told, mentally: "no. not now. not yet." i never got the ride!!! it made no sound; i shot my cap gun at it, when i was refused the ride. after a few more minutes it flew back east behind the trees, so i lost sight of it.
content.summary: I had close encounter by my home, it included telepathic refusal of taking me for ride. told not then, be later. not happen.
